,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."accident_cause_desc" "AccidentCauseDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."injury_nature_desc" "InjuryNatureDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."body_part_desc" "BodyPartDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."body_side_desc" "BodySideDesc" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."work_starttime" "WorkStarttime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employer_notified_date" "EmployerNotifiedDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."isemployeelosingworktime" "Isemployeelosingworktime" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."disability_start_date" "DisabilityStartDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."ismodifiedduty" "Ismodifiedduty" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."modifiedduty_start_date" "ModifieddutyStartDate" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."hadSafeguards" "HadSafeguards" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."wereSafeguardsUsed" "WereSafeguardsUsed" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."isQuestionableClaim" "IsQuestionableClaim" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."wasinjured_during_employment" "WasinjuredDuringEmployment" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_available" "WitnessAvailable" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_name" "WitnessName" ,"Form_HR_WorkersComp"."witness_phone" "WitnessPhone" "dbo"."Form_HR_WorkersComp" "Form_HR_WorkersComp" left join "dbo"."Site" "site" on "Form_HR_WorkersComp"."siteid" = "site"."siteid" left join "dbo"."Employee" "employee" on "Form_HR_WorkersComp"."employeeid" = "employee"."employeeid"

select "JobCostActual"."jobcostdetailbudgetid" "Jobcostdetailbudgetid" ,"JobCostActual"."companycode" "Companycode" ,"JobCostActual"."jobno" "Jobno" ,"Site"."siteid" "SiteSiteid" ,"Site"."site_name" "SiteName" ,"JobCostActual"."tyear" "Tyear" ,"JobCostActual"."tmonth" "Tmonth" ,"JobCostActual"."costcode" "Costcode" ,"JobCostCode"."description" "JobcostcodeDescription" ,"JobCostActual"."costrev" "Costrev" ,"JobCostActual"."costrevbudget" "Costrevbudget" from "dbo"."JobCostActual" "JobCostActual" left join "dbo"."Site" "Site" on "JobCostActual"."jobno" = "Site"."jobno" left join "dbo"."JobCostCode" "JobCostCode" on "JobCostActual"."costcode" = "JobCostCode"."costcode" and "JobCostActual"."companycode" = "JobCostCode"."companycode"

dataController.name: SiteAttachment
dataController.label: Site Attachment

command.text: select "SiteAttachment"."siteAttachmentId" "SiteAttachmentID" ,"SiteAttachment"."AttachmentTypeId" "AttachmentTypeID" ,"AttachmentType"."AttachmentTypeDescription" "AttachmentTypeDescription" ,"SiteAttachment"."FileName" "FileName" ,"SiteAttachment"."Length" "Length" ,"SiteAttachment"."ContentType" "ContentType" ,"SiteAttachment"."SiteId" "SiteID" ,"Site"."jobno" "Sitejobno" ,"Site"."site_name" "SiteAttachmentSiteName" ,"SiteAttachment"."createdDate" "CreatedDate" ,"SiteAttachment"."createdBy" "CreatedBy" from "dbo"."SiteAttachment" "SiteAttachment" left join "dbo"."SiteAttachmentType" "AttachmentType" on "SiteAttachment"."AttachmentTypeId" = "AttachmentType"."siteAttachmentTypeId" left join "dbo"."Site" "Site" on "SiteAttachment"."SiteId" = "Site"."siteid"

dataController.blobAdapterConfig: Field: Attachment Storage-System: File Path-Template: C:\Library\COT\PortfolioManager\{SiteAttachmentID}-{FileName} File-Name-Field: FileName Content-Type-Field: ContentType Length-Field: Length

"Details" ,"SiteCommunication"."dueDate" "DueDate" ,"SiteCommunication"."username" "Username" ,"SiteCommunication"."siteContactEmailId" "SiteCommunicationSiteContactEmailId" "SiteCommunication"."siteCommunicationCategoryId" = "siteCommunicationCategory"."siteCommunicationCategoryId" left join "dbo"."SiteContact" "siteContact" on "SiteCommunication"."siteContactId" = "siteContact"."siteContactId" left join "dbo"."SiteContactType" "siteContactcontactType" on "siteContact"."contactTypeId" = "siteContactcontactType"."contactTypeId" left join "dbo"."Site" "site" on "SiteCommunication"."siteId" = "site"."siteid" left join "dbo"."SiteContactEmail" "siteContactEmail" on "SiteCommunication"."siteContactEmailId" = "siteContactEmail"."siteContactEmailId"

field.name: FirstEmail
field.label: Email
field.formula: select Top 1 email from siteContactEmail where SiteContact.siteContactId = SiteContactEmail.siteContactId
